main event: On 19th November 1952, in Guanarito, Venezuela, the whole population of a small town observed two mysterious aircraft of an unknown type flying at very fast speeds to the north, later joined by two other smaller aircraft, before all four disappeared into the clouds.
interesting points: The sighting was verified by the Venezuelan Air Force, which had jets in the area at the time of the sighting.
The observation lasted only several seconds, indicating the speed at which the objects were moving.
The report mentions that the whole population of the town witnessed the event, implying multiple credible witnesses.
The source of the information was the local press, adding credibility to the report.
The report was evaluated as 'Unknown', indicating that the observed objects could not be conclusively identified.
witnesses: the whole population of the town
